segment.source: The topics in this section includes information about Internet-facing configurations for domain-joined and non-domain joined clients, as well as procedures you can use to assign the proper credentials to your App-V Desktop Clients.
segment.target: The topics in this section includes information about Internet-facing configurations for domain-joined and non-domain joined clients, as well as procedures you can use to assign the proper credentials to your App-V Desktop Clients.

segment.source: Provides general information about configuring domain-joined or non-domain-joined clients for successful network access.
segment.target: Provides general information about configuring domain-joined or non-domain-joined clients for successful network access.

segment.source: How to Assign the Proper Credentials for Windows XP
segment.target: How to Assign the Proper Credentials for Windows XP

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure for assigning credentials on an App-V Desktop Client running Windows XP.
segment.target: Provides a step-by-step procedure for assigning credentials on an App-V Desktop Client running Windows XP.

segment.source: How to Assign the Proper Credentials for Windows Vista
segment.target: How to Assign the Proper Credentials for Windows Vista

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure for assigning credentials on an App-V Desktop Client running Windows Vista.
